### What does AIS Doctor offer? 

AIS Doctor offers customized data scraping and analysis consulting services for young scholars, Ph.D. students, and small businesses. We have a dedicated team consisted of data scientists, professors in data analytics and information system. We will take care of your needs and help you move forward with your project.

Browse [our sample projects](https://rpubs.com/utjimmyx) for more info.  
 
### Specializations include:
* Data Scraping/Crawling using R or Python
* Data Analysis & modeling 
* Statistical modeling
* Short courses and workshops for business professionals
* Independent research/analysis
